did.abstract: This collection consists of a questionnaire answered by Kings County Almshouse officials with statistics on the institution for the year 1864.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection consists of a single document.

bioghist.head: Historical note
bioghist.p: The Kings County Almshouse was established in 1830.

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements
phystech.p: This document is broken into two pieces and should be handled with extra care.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Kings County Almshouse questionnaire, 1865, 1978.020, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was rehoused and the finding aid revised by Dee Bowers in 2023.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a questionnaire answered by Almshouse officials with statistics on the institution for the year 1864, including land acreage and buildings, name of the authority in charge (the Board of Superintendents for the Poor), the number of inmates in residence at the Almshouse (including children), and yearly maintenance costs.
